name: Dr. Frizzly's Mega Minigame Collection
description:
Dr. Frizzly has invited himself (into your house) and has a new game - Dr. Frizzy's Mega Minigame Collection! Complete as many minigames as you can before the 120 second time limit runs out.

How do I get him out of my house?

Dr. Frizzly's game engine license has time limit of a few minutes - so rounds of Dr. Frizzly's Mega Minigame Collection is limited to 120 seconds. To compensate, Dr. Frizzly speeds up the  minigames for the short rounds.

How do I control his game?

The game can be played with only a mouse, a touchscreen may be supported but I didn't test it on mobile.

What do I win?

Nothing! You win nothing! Just kidding, there's a leaderboard of the top 25 players. If you win a high score, you can also put your own name. You can view the leaderboard on the main menu.

Note: If the leaderboard server is down, the button is disabled.

Credits & Licenses

The cutscenes, the logo, the music, the 3D models, and the sprites are done by me.

The game engine used is Godot, © 2007-2023 Juan Linietsky, Ariel Manzur and contributors.

The font used in the logo is Secular One, designed by Michal Sahar and licensed under the Open Font License.

Blobby is made by WeightedCreepy.
